thread.title: Here’s What President Trump Will Say When He Addresses Congress Next Week
thread.title_full: Here’s What President Trump Will Say When He Addresses Congress Next Week

author: Kaitlan Collins
title: Here’s What President Trump Will Say When He Addresses Congress Next Week
text:
TOP 5498790 
President Trump will focus on the “renewal of American spirit” when he addresses a joint session of Congress early next week. (Photo: Getty Images) 
Press secretary Sean Spicer said the president is “currently working closely with the speechwriting team on presenting his vision to Congress and the American people” Tuesday. 
“The theme of the address will be the renewal of the American spirit,” Spicer said at the briefing Thursday. “The address will particularly focus on public safety including defense, increased border security, taking care of our veterans and then economic opportunity including education, job training, healthcare reform, jobs and tax and regulatory reform.”
